data.name: DeleteCashReceipt#1
data.value: delete from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier1) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier1) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)

data.name: DeleteCashReceipt#2
data.value: select top(1) 1 from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT T1 where (T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier2) and (T1.CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier2)

data.name: ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CASH_RECEIPT_ID, TOTAL_CASH_TRANSAC, TOT_NONCSH_TRN_AMT, TOT_CASH_TRAN_CNT, TOT_NOCSH_TRAN_CNT, TOT_DETAIL_ADJ_CNT, CASH_BAL_AMT, CASH_BAL_RSN, CASH_DUE, TOTAL_NC_FEE_AMT, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptEvent
data.value: select top(1) CST_IDENTIFIER, CREVENT_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, SOURCE_CREATION_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, TOT_NON_CSHTRN_CNT, TOT_ADJUSTMENT_CNT, TOT_CASH_FEE_AMT, TOT_NONCSH_FEE_AMT, ANTIC_CHECK_AMT, TOTAL_CASH_AMT, TOT_CASH_TRAN_CNT, TOT_NON_CASH_AMT from CKT_CR_EVENT where CREVENT_ID = @creventId

data.name: UpdateCashReceipt
data.value: update CKT_CASH_RECEIPT set TOTAL_CASH_TRANSAC = @totalCashTransac, TOT_CASH_TRAN_CNT = @totCashTranCnt, TOT_DETAIL_ADJ_CNT = @totDetailAdjCnt, CASH_BAL_AMT = @cashBalAmt, CASH_BAL_RSN = @cashBalRsn, CASH_DUE = @cashDue, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)
